jobTitle: Manufacturing Planner for Supply Chain Engineering
description:
Role: Manufacturing Planner for Supply Chain Engineering

Location: Long Beach, California, United States


Note:

Manufacturing Engineer, Manufacturing planner

Experience supporting Supply chain engineering team in planning manufacturing for Spares.


Technical/Functional Skills :


Understanding and ability to read and interpret technical drawings

General understanding of Aircraft parts and materials

Experience and conversant with Manufacturing processes for metals, non-metals and composites, preferably Aerospace domain

Familiar with creation of instructions and necessary tools or applications for optimization the working process

Co-ordination with offshore team for inputs/clarifications/delivery

Develops manufacturing concepts and strategies to support business objectives

Develops and integrates suppliers, processes, materials, data and technology to meet manufacturing and delivery requirements

Reviews and approves supplier data to ensure manufacturing related requirements are met

Drafts, updates and reviews processes and procedures to support business and regulatory agency requirements

Supports other teams as instructed to meet engineering commitments

Working with SAP service notifications, Orders/Quotes, Purchase Requisitions, and Requests for Assistance

Develops, implements and maintains various material masters and quote back-up sheets to define and document as-built configuration.


Interested candidates please share me your updated resume to gopinath.j3@tcs.com
